articles.description: Streaming services like Netflix, Hulu, and Disney Plus have some great new Halloween movies and shows, including Wendell & Wild and Guillermo del Toro’s Cabinet of Curiosities.
articles.content:
From black-and-white superhero stories to stop-motion family films, the streaming services have plenty of new stuff to freak you out this spooky season.
